com.nbcuni.mps

Class MPSPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nbcuni.mps.MPSPage

  • public class MPSPage
extends java.lang.Object
    Facilitates ad requests and other functionality for a particular content page.

      • getBannerAd

        public void getBannerAd(java.lang.String adSlotName,
                        android.view.ViewGroup viewGroup,
                        MPSBannerAdListener mpsBannerAdListener)
        Gets banner ad for the specified ad slot.
        Parameters:
        adSlotName - ad slot name for the requested ad.
        viewGroup - root view controller, required for ad view object.
        mpsBannerAdListener - callback to track ad events.

      • getBannerAd

        public void getBannerAd(java.lang.String adSlotName,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> additionalTargeting,
                        android.view.ViewGroup viewGroup,
                        MPSBannerAdListener mpsBannerAdListener)
        Gets banner ad for the specified ad slot.
        Parameters:
        adSlotName - ad slot name for the requested ad.
        additionalTargeting - additional targeting for an individual ad slot.
        viewGroup - root view controller, required for ad view object.
        mpsBannerAdListener - callback to track ad events.

      • getMpsUrl

        public java.net.URL getMpsUrl()
        The URL of the MPS page request.
        Returns:
        URL which is used for ad request or null if path parameter is empty.

                              android.content.Context context,
                              MPSInterstitialAdListener mpsAdListener)
        Gets interstitial ad for the specified ad slot.
        Parameters:
        adSlotName - ad slot name to display.
        context - current context.
        mpsAdListener - listener.
